txt.en: The inhabitants of the Flaming Deeps seem to hate the mirror; they abhor the light it reflects. But the dwarves need that light, for it shows the way and makes it safe to explore and mine.

'Thank you, [placeholder], for re-aligning that mirror. Although, I suppose I shouldn't get too pleased yet, for I am sure the creatures down there have already shoved the mirror out of alignment again.'
'The Flaming Deeps have many important secrets, for some of which that mirror is crucial to uncover.'
The mirror in the Flaming Deeps is constantly being disturbed by Deep-worms, fiery dragonets, and the Ghâsh-hai. Keeping it correctly aligned is a nigh-impossible task.
Thórgnyr is in Anazârmekhem, north of The Cross-roads of Ash.\n\nThórgnyr will want to know that you re-aligned the mirror.
Thórgnyr is in Anazârmekhem, north-east of The Cross-roads of Ash.\n\nThórgnyr will want to know you re-aligned the mirror.
